name: Step 3
description: After the user confirms they have terminated the process, list the active `script` processes again.
path_to_scripting: This step can be implemented as a simple script that executes `ps aux | grep script` again, after the user confirms that a process has been terminated. The output of this command would then be parsed to extract an updated list of active `script` processes and their associated PIDs. This updated list would then be used in the next step to confirm the termination of the malfunctioning process.
